mapper.sql: id, order_id, parts_type, parts_name, parts_num, remark, amount, creater, operator, createtime, operatortime
mapper.select: select v.parts_name as partsTypeName,v.partsCaregoryId,v.partsCaregoryName ,p.* from car_scrap_order_autoparts p left join (select p.*,c.parts_category_name as partsCaregoryName,c.id as partsCaregoryId from tb_car_parts p , tb_car_parts_category c where p.parts_category_id = c.id)v on p.parts_type = v.id where p.id= #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select (select DISTINCT t.audit_time from car_scrap_order_audit t where t.stauts='3' and t.order_id=p.id limit 0,1) as receiveTime, ( select sum(t.settlement_amount) from car_scrap_order_settlement t where t.settlement_object_id = p.id ) as settledAmount, v.parts_name as partsTypeName,v.partsCaregoryId,v.partsCaregoryName ,p.* from car_scrap_order_autoparts p left join (select p.*,c.parts_category_name as partsCaregoryName,c.id as partsCaregoryId from tb_car_parts p , tb_car_parts_category c where p.parts_category_id = c.id)v on p.parts_type = v.id where p.order_id= #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select o.order_no,o.order_time,o.report_no,o.car_number,o.car_frame_number,o.carModelNumberName, o.order_type,o.take_car_time,t.id,t.order_autoparts_status as orderStatus , t.partsTypeName,t.parts_name, t.partsCaregoryName,t.amount, (select ta.storage_path from car_scrap_order_attachment a,tb_attachment ta where a.attachment_id = ta.id and a.order_id=t.id and a.attachment_type='1' limit 0,1)as picture, case o.client_type when '1' then '个人' else (select c1.customer_name from sys_client c ,sys_company c1 where c.companyid = c1.id and c.id=o.client_id) end as custormName from( select o.car_model_number as carModelNumberName,o.* from car_scrap_order o ) o , ( select a.*,p.parts_name as partsTypeName,p.partsCaregoryName from car_scrap_order_autoparts a,(select p.*,c.parts_category_name as partsCaregoryName,c.id as partsCaregoryId from tb_car_parts p , tb_car_parts_category c where p.parts_category_id = c.id) p where a.parts_type= p.id) t where o.id = t.order_id and o.order_type='2' and t.order_autoparts_status= '5'
and (o.order_no like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or o.report_no like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or o.car_number like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or o.car_frame_number like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or o.take_car_contacts like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or o.take_car_contact_number like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or o.car_model_number like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%'))
and o.order_areas_id in
${item}
and t.sorting_state is not null
and t.sorting_state is null
order by t.operatortime desc

select * from ( select parts.*,audit.audit_time,audit.auditor,audit.remark as auditRemark,audit.stauts as orderStatus,c.*, (select ta.storage_path from car_scrap_order_attachment a,tb_attachment ta where a.attachment_id = ta.id and a.order_id=parts.id and a.attachment_type='1' limit 0,1)as picture,
case parts.client_type when '1' then '个人' else (select c1.customer_name from sys_client c ,sys_company c1 where c.companyid = c1.id and c.id=parts.client_id) end as custormName from (select aus.*, o.order_no,o.order_time,o.report_no,o.car_number,o.car_frame_number,o.carModelNumberName,o.order_type, o.take_car_time,o.client_id ,o.client_type,o.take_car_contact_number,o.take_car_contacts from car_scrap_order_autoparts aus , (select o.car_model_number as carModelNumberName,o.* from car_scrap_order o ) o where aus.order_id = o.id )parts left join car_scrap_order_audit audit on parts.id = audit.order_id left join (select c.parts_category_name as partsCaregoryName,c.id as categoryid ,p.parts_name as partsTypeName , p.id as partstypeid from tb_car_parts_category c,tb_car_parts p where c.id = p.parts_category_id ) c on c.partstypeid = parts.parts_type order by audit.audit_time )t
where 1=1
and t.auditor=#{vo.userid}
and t.orderStatus=#{vo.orderStatus}
and (t.order_no like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or t.report_no like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or t.car_number like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or t.car_frame_number like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or t.take_car_contacts like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or t.take_car_contact_number like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%') or t.carModelNumberName like CONCAT('%',#{vo.keyWord},'%'))
group by t.id order by t.operatortime desc

select
case o.client_type when '1' then '个人' else (select c1.customer_name from sys_client c ,sys_company c1 where c.companyid = c1.id and c.id=o.client_id) end as custormName,
(select t.real_name from sys_user t where t.id=o.agent_userid ) saleName, p.* ,cp.partsCaregoryName,cp.parts_name as partsTypeName,cp.partsCaregoryId ,o.report_no,o.car_number,o.take_car_contacts,o.order_no, o.payee_name,o.bank_account,o.opening_bank, o.take_car_contact_number,o.take_car_time, o.take_car_address,o.car_frame_number,o.car_model_number as carModelNumberName,o.order_time from car_scrap_order_autoparts p left join
(select p.*,c.parts_category_name as partsCaregoryName,c.id as partsCaregoryId from tb_car_parts p , tb_car_parts_category c where p.parts_category_id = c.id) cp on p.parts_type = cp.id ,car_scrap_order o where o.id = p.order_id and p.id= #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
